body: Samsarans are defined by class levels—they do not have racial Hit Dice. Samsarans have the following racial traits.
name: Samsaran

sections.body: Samsarans are insightful and strong-minded, but their bodies tend to be frail.
sections.name: +2 Intelligence, +2 Wisdom, –2 Constitution

sections.body: Samsarans are Medium creatures and have no bonuses or penalties due to their size.
sections.name: Medium

sections.body: Samsarans have a base speed of 30 feet.
sections.name: Normal Speed

sections.body: Samsarans can see twice as far as humans in conditions of dim light.
sections.name: Low-Light Vision

sections.body: Samsarans gain a +2 racial bonus on saving throws against death effects, negative energy effects, saves to remove negative levels, and Con checks to stabilize.
sections.name: Lifebound

sections.body: Samsarans with a Charisma score of 11 or higher gain the following: 1/day—comprehend languages, deathwatch, stabilize. The caster level is equal to the samsaran's character level.
sections.name: Spell-Like Abilities

sections.body: A samsaran gains a +2 bonus on any two skills and these become class skills.
sections.name: Shards of the Past

sections.body: Samsarans begin play speaking Common and Samsaran. Those with high Intelligence scores can choose from the following: any human language, Abyssal, Aquan, Auran, Celestial, Draconic, Giant, Ignan, Infernal, and Terran.
sections.name: Languages
